resources.string: Save your eyes - save your life\nsave your children

Our team aims to save the lives of children who have undergone Retinoblastoma with the help of Information Technology. The methodology developed in a smartphone-based app has proven to be RB-specific, and this can turn out to be a good result after treatment for vision recovery.

1.Aziza Ismoilova - Student of Turin polytechnic University at Computer Science faculty. She helped to develop this app
\n2.Yashnar Esonov - Student of Tashkent Pediatric Medical Institute, 2nd course of master degree of Ophthalmology. He came up with the idea for this app.
\n3.Madina Kakhkharova - Bachelor degree Student of Tashkent state university of economics she helped to develop backend part of application on Python
We aimed to distribute new technology to medicine for saving children\'s life
